title: Contributing to feowR
text: outlines propose change feowR. detailed discussion contributing tidyverse packages, please see development contributing guide code review principles.

title: Contributing to feowR
text: can fix typos, spelling mistakes, grammatical errors documentation directly using GitHub web interface, long changes made source file. generally means ’ll need edit roxygen2 comments .R, .Rd file. can find .R file generates .Rd reading comment first line.

title: Contributing to feowR
text: want make bigger change, ’s good idea first file issue make sure someone team agrees ’s needed. ’ve found bug, please file issue illustrates bug minimal reprex (also help write unit test, needed). See guide create great issue advice.

title: Contributing to feowR
text: Fork package clone onto computer. haven’t done , recommend using usethis::create_from_github("brunomioto/feowR", fork = TRUE). Install development dependencies devtools::install_dev_deps(), make sure package passes R CMD check running devtools::check(). R CMD check doesn’t pass cleanly, ’s good idea ask help continuing. Create Git branch pull request (PR). recommend using usethis::pr_init("brief-description--change"). Make changes, commit git, create PR running usethis::pr_push(), following prompts browser. title PR briefly describe change. body PR contain Fixes #issue-number. user-facing changes, add bullet top NEWS.md (.e. just first header). Follow style described https://style.tidyverse.org/news.html.

title: Contributing to feowR
text: New code follow tidyverse style guide. can use styler package apply styles, please don’t restyle code nothing PR. use roxygen2, Markdown syntax, documentation. use testthat unit tests. Contributions test cases included easier accept.

title: Contributing to feowR
text: Please note feowR project released Contributor Code Conduct. contributing project agree abide terms.

what: Download shapefiles of Freshwater Ecoregions of the World (FEOW)
title: Download shapefiles of Freshwater Ecoregions of the World (FEOW)
text: feowR provides faster secure way download shapefiles Freshwater Ecoregions World (FEOW) using piggyback R package.

title: Download shapefiles of Freshwater Ecoregions of the World (FEOW)
text: can install development version feowR GitHub :

title: Download shapefiles of Freshwater Ecoregions of the World (FEOW)
text: Now let’s plot !  can see list ecoregions, FEOW website
code: library(feowR)  feow_sf <- read_feow() library(ggplot2)  ggplot(data = feow_sf)+   geom_sf() ecoregions_list #> # A tibble: 426 × 4 #>       id realm    major_habitat_type                       ecoregion             #>    <int> <chr>    <chr>                                    <chr>                 #>  1   101 Nearctic Polar freshwaters                        Alaskan Coastal       #>  2   102 Nearctic Polar freshwaters                        Upper Yukon           #>  3   103 Nearctic Temperate coastal rivers                 Alaska & Canada Paci… #>  4   104 Nearctic Temperate floodplain rivers and wetlands Upper Mackenzie       #>  5   105 Nearctic Polar freshwaters                        Lower Mackenzie       #>  6   106 Nearctic Polar freshwaters                        Central Arctic Coast… #>  7   107 Nearctic Temperate upland rivers                  Upper Saskatchewan    #>  8   108 Nearctic Temperate upland rivers                  Middle Saskatchewan   #>  9   109 Nearctic Large lakes                              English - Winnipeg L… #> 10   110 Nearctic Temperate coastal rivers                 Southern Hudson Bay   #> # ℹ 416 more rows

title: Ecoregions List — ecoregions_list
text: dataset provides information FEOW ecoregions, including major habitat types specific ecoregions.

title: Ecoregions List — ecoregions_list
text: data frame 426 rows 4 variables: id integer vector. unique identifier ecoregion. realm character vector. biogeographic realm. major_habitat_type character vector. major habitat type ecoregion. ecoregion character vector. specific name ecoregion.

title: Ecoregions List — ecoregions_list
text: https://www.feow.org/ecoregions/list

title: Ecoregions List — ecoregions_list
text: Nature Conservancy World Wildlife Fund, Inc.
